name: Uncured
storyline:
Infected with a lethal zombie virus, you take on a race against time as your humanity starts to succumb to corruption. You’re stabilized by virtue of an eccentric scientist who found you, battered and infected.

You try to use your newly gained mutational powers to your favor as you fight grotesque undead, a corrupt military and clashing survivor guilds in order to find a cure for your disease.

Upgrade and expand your hub, enhance your mutations and rescue other survivors to aid you in your hunt for the antivirus.

Will you compromise innocent lives to reach your goals?
Or will you stay true to your humanity in the face of challenge and death?
summary: Uncured, Unhinged, Unyielding. In this unique roguelike platformer, you slash your path through masses of infectious beasts, relentless constructs of steel, and corrupt militaries that stand between you and the antivirus. Begin your journey to the heart of the capital before the time runs out.
